name.value: 西山公園 レッサーパンダ

desc.value: レッサーパンダと西山公園のつつじ。西山公園は、５月のGW前後がつつじがみごろです。園内の西山動物園は入園無料。
朝倉ゆめまる君と足羽川の桜並木。足羽川の堤防に並ぶ桜並木は、４月上旬がみごろ。「さくら名所100選」にも選ばれています。
Lesser panda & azalea in nishiyama park.Azalea's season is the beginning of May. You can meet some animals in zoo with free of charge.

name.value: Row of cherry blossom trees, Asuwa  River

desc.value: Asakura YUMEMARU & row of cherry blossom trees around asuwa river.You can see such a amazing cherry blossom on the beginning of April. The place is also designated as one of Japan's Top 100 Cherry Blossom Viewing Sites
